item.title: Running Ollama AI in Your Homelab
item.description: Ollama Ollama is a platform designed to run AI models locally. It offers a streamlined experience for deploying and managing AI applications without requiring extensive cloud resources. Ollama supports a variety of models and provides tools for easy integrations and monitoring.
